dcterms:creator: Andreas Rossler
Davide Cozzolino
Luisa Verdoliva
Christian Riess
Justus Thies
Matthias Niessner
dcterms:description: A widely used benchmark for intra-dataset deepfake detection, consisting of 1,000 real videos and 4,000 fake videos across four different manipulations: DeepFake, FaceSwap, Face2Face, and NeuralTextures, with three video qualities: high quality, low quality, and RAW.
dcterms:title: FaceForensics++ (FF++)

dcterms:creator: Yuezun Li
Xin Yang
Pu Sun
Honggang Qi
Siwei Lyu
dcterms:description: A popular benchmark for cross-dataset deepfake detection, containing 5,693 deepfake videos generated from celebrities, utilizing an improved compositing process to enhance visual quality.
dcterms:title: Celeb-DF (CDF)

dcterms:creator: Brian Dolhansky
Joanna Bitton
Ben Pflaum
Jikuo Lu
Russ Howes
Menglin Wang
Cristian Canton Ferrer
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset developed for the Deepfake Detection Challenge, including 124,000 videos from 3,426 paid actors, designed to evaluate deepfake detection methods.
dcterms:title: DeepFake Detection Challenge (DFDC)

dcterms:creator: Lingzhi Li
Jianmin Bao
Hao Yang
Dong Chen
Fang Wen
dcterms:description: A dataset that generates high-fidelity swapped faces by thoroughly and adaptively exploiting and integrating target attributes based on 1,000 original videos from FaceForensics++.
dcterms:title: FaceShifter (FSh)

dcterms:creator: Liming Jiang
Ren Li
Wayne Wu
Chen Qian
Chen Change Loy
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for real-world face forgery detection, containing 60,000 videos with 17.6 million frames, varying in identity, pose, expression, emotion, and lighting conditions.
dcterms:title: DeeperForensics (DFo)

dcterms:creator: Bojia Zi
Minghao Chang
Jingjing Chen
Xingjun Ma
Yu-Gang Jiang
dcterms:description: A challenging real-world dataset for deepfake detection, encompassing 7,314 facial sequences extracted from 707 deepfake videos gathered from online sources.
dcterms:title: Wild-Deepfake (Wild-DF)

dcterms:creator: Jonas Ricker
Simon Damm
Thorsten Holz
Asja Fischer
dcterms:description: A comprehensive benchmark for diffusion-generated and GAN-generated images, including samples from five diffusion models and five GANs, totaling 50,000 samples.
dcterms:title: Deepfakes LSUN-Bedroom (DLB)

dcterms:creator: Patrick Kwon
Jaeseong You
Gyuhyeon Nam
Sungwoo Park
Gyeongsu Chae
dcterms:description: A large-scale Korean deepfake detection dataset containing 175,776 fake clips and 62,166 real clips of 403 Korean subjects, generated using six different models.
dcterms:title: KoDF
